repairedDockerfile:
FROM debian:sid 
MAINTAINER Anton Lindstr√∂m <carlantonlindstrom@gmail.com> 

RUN apt-get update && \
 apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y gcc make git && \
rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* && \
cd /root && \
git clone https://github.com/kynesim/tstools.git && \
cd tstools && \
make && \
make install && \
apt-get purge -y gcc make git && \
apt autoremove -y && \
rm -rf /root/tstools
